connection.port_link.desc: Connect the device to the network switch. Check the device and the switch for the green connection light & no errors

connection.port_speed.desc: Verify the device auto-negotiates connection speed

connection.port_duplex.desc: Verify the device supports full duplex

poe.power.desc: Verify that the device draws less than the maximum power allocated by the port. This is 15.4W for 802.3af and 30W for 802.3at

poe.negotiation.desc: Verify the device autonegotiates power requirements

poe.support.desc: Verify if the device supports PoE
